patterns: Is Vote Coin better than ChoiceCoin?
Is Vote Coin better than QVote?
responses: Vote Coin differs from choice coin and QVote with the basic logic on how results are calculated. Vote coin standard uses blockchain to store the data - questions, answers, delegations, management and result messages. The results are calculated offchain using the indexer and complicated way which allows circular delegation, quadratic voting and encryption. Because all data is onchain, everything is auditable and verifiable. The ability to cast vote in single transaction and ability to delegate voting power to someone else makes vote coin the most affordable voting onchain solution.

patterns: Where is the vote coin source code?
responses: Vote coin specs is open source, vote coin application is also open source, and vote coin API is open source as well. Specifications: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/scholtz/AMS/main/AMS-0001/AMS-0001.md, Demo and mainnet application: https://github.com/scholtz/vote-coin-demo, API: https://github.com/scholtz/VoteCoinApi, Vote coin web: https://github.com/scholtz/vote-coin-docs

patterns: Tell me the basic concept of vote coin
responses: The goal of this standard is to make the knowledge based pure democracy reality. This standard defines specification on how organization can propose voting, how organization can create trusted list of voters, how person can cast votes and how person can delegate other persons to vote on his behalf.The goal of these conventions is to make any organization who seeks public voting the standard on how to vote.Even if this standard is meant to be for algorand for the effeciency of the transactions and low transaction costs, it is not limitted to this blockchain. It can be used with any blockchain who support self transactions with specific payment, note field with at least 1000 bytes long message, and ability to search the network for specific transactions indexed by the amount, start of the note field, and/or the account.
